name: videodb-focusd
description: AI-powered productivity tracker built with VideoDB

scripts.reset:db: rm -f "$HOME/Library/Application Support/videodb-focusd/focusd.db" "$HOME/Library/Application Support/VideoDB Focusd/focusd.db" && echo 'Database deleted (dev + packaged). It will be recreated on next launch.'
scripts.postinstall: electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && if [ -f node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app/Contents/Info.plist ]; then plutil -replace CFBundleDisplayName -string 'VideoDB Focusd' node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app/Contents/Info.plist && plutil -replace CFBundleName -string 'VideoDB Focusd' node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app/Contents/Info.plist && touch node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app && echo 'Patched Electron plist with app name'; fi
